text: HRdm 774ftv <TTHT gfear"T TMY /Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (aeq WRaa7t &< 7oTf #3Tq4) 447 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QAH. /Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 6it-5 0a 6, #4er-10, ETrFT; 7f facrft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 No.11013/01/2011/P&IS- (RCRSS) March 03, 2011 CIRCULAR Sub: Road User Complaint, Redressal & Suggestion System (RCRSS): As are aware that a FaceBook page based Road User Complaint, Redressal Suggestion System has been in place by NHAI where by the complaints/ comments/   suggestions received from road users are being forwarded to the concerned officers for further necessary action and resolution of all the complaints  In this regard, a circular was issued on February 08, 2011 (copy enclosed) 2 _ It has been noticed that some of the officers have opened their FaceBook accounts and are posting their responses also. However, it appears that most of the officers are to open their FaceBook accounts and carry out the activities as per the enclosed circular. 3 It is pertinent to mention that on FaceBook people expect quick response; Response   posted by the concerned officer within few hours would be much appreciated, It should also be noted that delayed response brings negative publicity to the organization.  Therefore, as desired by the Hon'ble Minister for Road Transport & Highways, would like to reiterate that all the officers of NHAI shall invariably open FaceBook account and keep watch on the complaints/ comments/ suggestions related to their area as well as post their immediate response on the FaceBook wall: Enck: As above: (RS Gujral) Chairman, NHAI To All ZOs AIl ROs AIl PDs AIl CGMs, NHAI HQ All GMs, NHAI HQ Copyto AII Members Ht Ttm NHAL you put yet
